mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match_participant (matchId, memberId, type) VALUES (#{matchId}, #{memberId}, '풋살')
INSERT INTO match_participant (matchId, memberId, position, type) VALUES (#{matchId}, #{memberId}, #{position}, '축구')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM match_participant WHERE matchId = #{matchId} AND memberId = #{memberId}
SELECT m.id AS id, mp.position, m.nickName, m.rank, m.manner FROM match_participant mp JOIN member m ON mp.memberId = m.id WHERE mp.matchId = #{matchId}

( SELECT fa.id, fa.title, fa.playDate, fs.img, fs.stadiumName AS stadium, '풋살' AS type FROM ftArticle fa JOIN match_participant mp ON fa.id = mp.matchId JOIN football_stadium fs ON fa.fsId = fs.id WHERE mp.memberId = #{memberId} AND fa.playDate > NOW() ) UNION ( SELECT sa.id, sa.title, sa.playDate, ss.img, ss.stadiumName AS stadium, '축구' AS type FROM scArticle sa JOIN match_participant mp ON sa.id = mp.matchId JOIN soccer_stadium ss ON sa.ssId = ss.id WHERE mp.memberId = #{memberId} AND sa.playDate > NOW() ) ORDER BY playDate ASC LIMIT 1
